meanings: (사람을) meet, see; (처음으로) (formal) encounter; (우연히) come across, run[bump] into
약속 Is our appointment still on?
약속 Any changes in the plan?
이성교제 Let's not see each other anymore.
초대와 방문 How about meeting at my place?

meanings.meaning: out of the frying pan into the fire

vlive.korean: 우리가 만나는 날? The day we meet? 듣기 View video SF9 : 앙뇽
혹시 요즘 만나는 분? Is this the person you're seeing these days? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 다시 만난 날 [가두리횟집] EP04
vlive.english: Is this the person you're seeing these days?

vlive.korean: 다시 만나는 그날까지 에이~ - 에이~ Until we meet again, Eyy~ - Eyy~ 듣기 View video NCT : 드라이브이앱2💚
vlive.english: Until we meet again, Eyy~ - Eyy~

vlive.korean: 또 이렇게 만나는 것도 재밌네요~ 그렇죠? It's fun to meet you like this, right? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [Full] 윤아의 원데이 라디오_90.530MHz
vlive.english: It's fun to meet you like this, right?

vlive.korean: 네 직접 만나는 게 아무래도 더 좋겠죠? Yes, it's better to meet in person, right? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 🌼🌼🌼
vlive.english: Yes, it's better to meet in person, right?

examples.korean: His dearest wish is to see his grandchildren again. 발음듣기 그의 가장 큰 소망은 손주들을 다시 만나는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His dearest wish is to see his grandchildren again. 발음

examples.korean: There was a signpost where the two paths converged. 발음듣기 그 두 소로가 만나는 지점에 표지판이 하나 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was a signpost where the two paths converged. 발음

examples.korean: She is against seeing him. 발음듣기 그녀는 그를 만나는 것에 반대한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is against seeing him. 발음

examples.korean: the perplexities of life 발음듣기 인생에서 만나는 당혹스러운 일들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Turn right at the corner of Sunset and Crescent Heights Boulevards. 발음듣기 선셋 대로와 크레센트 하이츠 대로가 만나는 모퉁이에서 우회전 하세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Turn right at the corner of Sunset and Crescent Heights Boulevards. 발음
